name: Marshmallow Popcorn Balls

steps: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray; set aside.. Heat oil in a 4-quart saucepan over high heat. Add popcorn kernels to hot oil. name: Grandpa's Popcorn Balls

name: Favorite Popcorn Balls
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'unpopped popcorn'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'molasses'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Add 1 tablespoon of the oil to a 4 quart saucepan, and heat over high heat. When oil is hot, add 1/2 cup of popping corn. Keep pan moving constantly. When corn stops popping, remove from heat. name: Halloween Popcorn Pumpkins

steps: Gather all ingredients. Grease a muffin pan and set aside.. Place popcorn, candy corn and peanuts into a large bowl and set aside.. Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.
